channel.title: Wang CHEN's website on Wang CHEN
channel.description: Recent content in Wang CHEN's website on Wang CHEN

item.title: noiseDetector
item.description: Noise detector using deep learning method (semi-supervised learning with pre-training) to detect seat mechatronic product’s abnormal noise. Used in production EOL quality control.

item.title: TRKSliding
item.description: TRKSliding is a project helps manufacturing team optimize seat track assembling process. Using machine learning to determine best ball parameter and grind cycles for assembling process. In order to meet sliding effort quality control.

item.title: TIGWelding
item.description: TIGWelding is a project using 3D scan data to detect leadscrew welding quality issue. Using auto-encoder to detect outlier of the TIG welding.

item.title: TADA
item.description: TADA(Thc Automatic Display Analysis) is a tool for CAL FAS internal use only. it is build to visualize and aggregate the FEA result. See details in https://gvscal.github.io/tada/

item.title: RCDataAnalysis
item.description: This is an explorative project which we look at historical product data from world wide continues recliner assembling line, search for data values and try to improve the process.

item.title: Who am I
item.description: Who am I? An engineer A data scientist A cat lover A poker player Why engineer? Why a engineer? solve problems, impact on society ! Why data scientist? That’s another vision to view things/problems, and math is so beautiful ! Why cat lover? Remind the kindest things around me ! Why poker? Mental exercise, embrance the variance of life, learn how to invest and deal with risk.
